sn48.67:4.1: “Mendicants, of all the trees in India, the rose-apple is said to be the best.
sn48.67:4.2: In the same way, the faculty of wisdom is said to be the best of the qualities that lead to awakening in terms of
sn48.67:4.4: And what are the factors that lead to awakening?
sn48.67:4.9: and wisdom are qualities that lead to awakening, in that they lead to becoming awakened.
sn48.67:4.10: Of all the trees in India, the rose-apple is said to be the best.
